title: Title IX - Partnership
coverage: General Provisions, Obligations of Partners, Dissolution and Winding Up, Limited Partnership

required_clauses.name: business_name
required_clauses.requirement: Must operate under a firm name

required_clauses.name: business_purpose
required_clauses.requirement: Must have lawful object/purpose for common benefit

required_clauses.name: capital_contribution
required_clauses.requirement: Partners must contribute money, property, or industry

required_clauses.name: partnership_type
required_clauses.requirement: Must specify if general or limited partnership

required_clauses.name: management
required_clauses.requirement: Specify managing partner(s) or all partners manage
required_clauses.default: All partners have equal management rights

required_clauses.name: partnership_duration
required_clauses.requirement: May be for fixed term or at will

capital_contribution.description: No minimum capital required for general partnership

capital_for_sec_registration.description: Partnerships with PHP 3,000+ capital must register with SEC

number_of_partners.description: At least 2 persons required to form partnership

mandatory_provisions.name: Equal Partnership
mandatory_provisions.description: No partner can be excluded from profits or losses
mandatory_provisions.rule: Stipulation excluding partner from profits/losses is VOID

mandatory_provisions.name: Industrial Partner Protection
mandatory_provisions.description: Industrial partners not liable for losses
mandatory_provisions.rule: Industrial partner shall not be liable for losses

mandatory_provisions.name: Partner Liability
mandatory_provisions.description: Partners liable pro rata after partnership assets exhausted
mandatory_provisions.rule: All partners liable with all their property after partnership assets exhausted

mandatory_provisions.name: Partnership Books
mandatory_provisions.description: Partners must have access to books
mandatory_provisions.rule: Every partner has right to inspect and copy partnership books

mandatory_provisions.name: Information Rights
mandatory_provisions.rule: Partners must render true and full information on demand

mandatory_provisions.name: Non-Compete (Industrial)
mandatory_provisions.description: Industrial partner cannot engage in same business
mandatory_provisions.rule: Industrial partner cannot engage in business unless permitted

mandatory_provisions.name: Non-Compete (Capitalist)
mandatory_provisions.description: Capitalist partners cannot compete unless allowed
mandatory_provisions.rule: Capitalist partners cannot engage in same business unless stipulated

sec_registration.required_if: Capital >= PHP 3,000 or immovable property contributed
sec_registration.description: Must be in public instrument and recorded with SEC

immovable_property.required_if: Immovable property or real rights contributed
immovable_property.description: Public instrument required + inventory signed and attached

dissolution_causes.cause: Express will of any partner (at-will partnership)

partner_rights.right: Interest in the partnership (share of profits/surplus)

limited_partnership.limited_partner_liability: Not liable if doesn't participate in control

creditor_priority.rule: Partnership creditors preferred over personal creditors

partnership_by_estoppel.rule: Person representing self as partner liable to those who relied on representation

profit_exclusion_check.description: Contract is VOID if any partner excluded from profits/losses

immovable_property_check.description: Contributing immovable property requires public instrument and inventory

supplemental_laws.law_name: Revised Corporation Code of the Philippines
supplemental_laws.coverage: Distinction between partnerships and corporations; conversion and registration rules
supplemental_laws.notes: Applies when partnership structure overlaps with corporate characteristics

supplemental_laws.coverage: Limited partnerships, professional partnerships, partnership by estoppel
supplemental_laws.notes: Special rules modifying general partnership principles

juridical_personality_distinction.rule: Partnership is distinct from corporation and governed by Civil Code unless registered as corporation

prohibition_on_corporate_attributes.rule: Partnership shall not represent itself as a corporation

registration_requirement.rule: Partnerships required to register with SEC if capital reaches statutory threshold or involves real property

name_verification.rule: Business name must not be misleading or identical to existing registered entities

conversion_to_corporation.rule: Partnership may convert to corporation subject to SEC approval

limited_partnership.rule: Limited partnership must register certificate with SEC

professional_partnership.rule: Partnership formed for practice of profession is governed by special laws and professional regulations
professional_partnership.notes: Subject to PRC and professional ethics rules

partnership_by_estoppel.rule: Persons representing themselves as partners are liable as such

personal_liability.rule: Partners remain personally liable unlike corporate shareholders

piercing_analogy_warning.rule: Use of partnership to evade law or defraud creditors may result in personal liability

misrepresentation_check.description: Ensure partnership is not falsely represented as a corporation

limited_partnership_certificate_check.description: Limited partnership must have valid SEC certificate
